get.description: This endpoint can be used to obtain account summary information.

spotSubQuantity.description: Number of sub-accounts with spot trading permissions enabled

marginSubQuantity.description: Number of sub-accounts with margin trading permissions enabled

futuresSubQuantity.description: Number of sub-accounts with futures trading permissions enabled

optionSubQuantity.description: Number of sub-accounts with option trading permissions enabled

maxSubQuantity.description: Max number of sub-accounts = maxDefaultSubQuantity + maxSpotSubQuantity

maxDefaultSubQuantity.description: Max number of default open sub-accounts (according to VIP level)

maxSpotSubQuantity.description: Max number of sub-accounts with additional Spot trading permissions

maxMarginSubQuantity.description: Max number of sub-accounts with additional margin trading permissions

maxFuturesSubQuantity.description: Max number of sub-accounts with additional futures trading permissions

maxOptionSubQuantity.description: Max number of sub-accounts with additional Option trading permissions

get.x-sdk-method-description: This endpoint can be used to obtain account summary information.

get.description: This interface determines whether the current user is a spot high-frequency user or a spot low-frequency user.

data.description: Spot account type. True means the current user is a high-frequency spot user, False means the current user is a low-frequency spot user

get.x-sdk-method-description: This interface determines whether the current user is a spot high-frequency user or a spot low-frequency user.

get.description: This interface is for transaction records from all types of your accounts, supporting inquiry of various currencies. Items are paginated and sorted to show the latest first. See the Pagination section for retrieving additional entries after the first page.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency ( you can choose more than one currency). You can specify 10 currencies at most for one time. If not specified, all currencies will be inquired by default.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: direction: in, out

parameters.name: bizType
parameters.description: Type: DEPOSIT -deposit, WITHDRAW -withdraw, TRANSFER -transfer, SUB_TRANSFER -subaccount transfer,TRADE_EXCHANGE -trade, MARGIN_EXCHANGE -margin trade, KUCOIN_BONUS -bonus, BROKER_TRANSFER -Broker transfer record

parameters.name: startAt
parameters.description: Start time (milisecond)

parameters.name: endAt
parameters.description: End time (milisecond)

parameters.name: currentPage
parameters.description: Current request page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of results per request. Minimum is 10, maximum is 500.

amount.description: The total amount of assets (fees included) involved in assets changes such as transaction, withdrawal and bonus distribution.

fee.description: Fees generated in transaction, withdrawal, etc.

accountType.description: The account type of the master user: MAIN, TRADE, MARGIN or CONTRACT.

bizType.description: Business type leading to the changes in funds, such as exchange, withdrawal, deposit, KUCOIN_BONUS, REFERRAL_BONUS, Lendings etc.

context.description: Business related information such as order ID, serial No., etc.

get.x-sdk-method-description: This interface is for transaction records from all types of your accounts, supporting inquiry of various currencies. Items are paginated and sorted to show the latest first. See the Pagination section for retrieving additional entries after the first page.

get.description: This API endpoint returns all transfer (in and out) records in high-frequency trading account and supports multi-coin queries. The query results are sorted in descending order by createdAt and id.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency ( you can choose more than one currency). You can specify 10 currencies at most for one time. If not specified, all currencies will be inquired by default.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: direction: in, out

parameters.name: bizType
parameters.description: Transaction type: TRANSFER-transfer funds,TRADE_EXCHANGE-Trade

parameters.name: lastId
parameters.description: The id of the last set of data from the previous batch of data. By default, the latest information is given.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Default100，Max200

parameters.name: startAt
parameters.description: Start time (milisecond)

parameters.name: endAt
parameters.description: End time (milisecond)

balance.description: Total balance of funds after change

bizType.description: Trnasaction type，such as TRANSFER, TRADE_EXCHANGE, etc.

direction.description: Direction of transfer( out or in)

get.x-sdk-method-description: This API endpoint returns all transfer (in and out) records in high-frequency trading account and supports multi-coin queries. The query results are sorted in descending order by createdAt and id.

get.description: This API endpoint returns all transfer (in and out) records in high-frequency margin trading account and supports multi-coin queries. The query results are sorted in descending order by createdAt and id.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: currency, optional，can select more than one，separate with commas，select no more than 10 currencys，the default will be to query for all currencys if left empty

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: direction: in, out

parameters.name: bizType
parameters.description: Transaction type: TRANSFER- transfer funds, MARGIN_EXCHANGE - cross margin trade, ISOLATED_EXCHANGE - isolated margin trade, LIQUIDATION - liquidation, ASSERT_RETURN - forced liquidation asset return

parameters.name: lastId
parameters.description: The id of the last set of data from the previous batch of data. By default, the latest information is given.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Default100，Max200

parameters.name: startAt
parameters.description: Start time (milisecond)

parameters.name: endAt
parameters.description: End time (milisecond)

balance.description: Total balance of funds after change

bizType.description: Trnasaction type，such as TRANSFER, TRADE_EXCHANGE, etc.

direction.description: Direction of transfer( out or in)

get.x-sdk-method-description: This API endpoint returns all transfer (in and out) records in high-frequency margin trading account and supports multi-coin queries. The query results are sorted in descending order by createdAt and id.

get.description: This interface can query the ledger records of the futures business line

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency of transaction history, XBT or USDT

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type RealisedPNL-Realised profit and loss, Deposit-Deposit, Withdrawal-withdraw, Transferin-Transfer in, TransferOut-Transfer out

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Start offset. Generally, the only attribute of the last returned result of the previous request is used, and the first page is returned by default

parameters.name: forward
parameters.description: This parameter functions to judge whether the lookup is forward or not. True means “yes” and False means “no”. This parameter is set as true by default

parameters.name: maxCount
parameters.description: Displayed size per page. The default size is 50

parameters.name: startAt
parameters.description: Start time (milisecond)

parameters.name: endAt
parameters.description: End time (milisecond)

type.description: Type: RealisedPNL, Deposit, Withdrawal, TransferIn, TransferOut

hasMore.description: Is it the last page. If it is false, it means it is the last page, and if it is true, it means need to turn the page.

get.x-sdk-method-description: This interface can query the ledger records of the futures business line

get.description: Get a list of accounts. Please Deposit to the main account firstly, then transfer the funds to the trade account via Inner Transfer before transaction.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: currency

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Account type main、trade

available.description: Funds available to withdraw or trade

holds.description: Funds on hold (not available for use)

get.x-sdk-method-description: Get a list of accounts. Please Deposit to the main account firstly, then transfer the funds to the trade account via Inner Transfer before transaction.

get.description: get Information for a single spot account. Use this endpoint when you know the accountId.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Path parameter. Account ID

available.description: Funds available to withdraw or trade

holds.description: Funds on hold (not available for use)

get.x-sdk-method-description: get Information for a single spot account. Use this endpoint when you know the accountId.

get.description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the cross margin account.

parameters.name: quoteCurrency
parameters.description: quote currency, currently only supports USDT, KCS, BTC, USDT as default

parameters.name: queryType
parameters.description: Query account type (default MARGIN), MARGIN - only query low frequency cross margin account, MARGIN_V2-only query high frequency cross margin account, ALL - consistent aggregate query with the web side

status.description: Position status; EFFECTIVE-effective, BANKRUPTCY-bankruptcy liquidation, LIQUIDATION-closing, REPAY-repayment, BORROW borrowing

maxBorrowSize.description: The user's remaining maximum loan amount

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the cross margin account.

get.description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the isolated margin account.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: For isolated trading pairs, query all without passing

parameters.name: quoteCurrency
parameters.description: quote currency, currently only supports USDT, KCS, BTC, USDT as default

parameters.name: queryType
parameters.description: Query account type (default ISOLATED), ISOLATED- - only query low frequency isolated margin account, ISOLATED_V2-only query high frequency isolated margin account, ALL - consistent aggregate query with the web side

status.description: Position status; EFFECTIVE-effective, BANKRUPTCY-bankruptcy liquidation, LIQUIDATION-closing, REPAY-repayment, BORROW borrowing

maxBorrowSize.description: The user's remaining maximum loan amount
The user's remaining maximum loan amount

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the isolated margin account.

get.description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the futures account.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currecny, Default XBT

marginBalance.description: Margin balance = positionMargin + orderMargin + frozenFunds + availableBalance - unrealisedPNL

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the futures account.

get.description: Get the information of the api key. Use the api key pending to be checked to call the endpoint. Both master and sub user's api key are applicable.

permission.description: [Permissions](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/doc-338144),  possible values: General, Spot, Margin, Futures, InnerTransfer, Transfer, Earn

isMaster.description: Whether it is the master account.

subName.description: Sub Name, There is no such param for the master account

get.x-sdk-method-description: Get the information of the api key. Use the api key pending to be checked to call the endpoint. Both master and sub user's api key are applicable.

get.description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the margin account.

holdBalance.description: Funds on hold in the account

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the margin account.

get.summary: Get Account List - Isolated Margin - V1
get.description: Request via this endpoint to get the info list of the isolated margin account.

parameters.name: balanceCurrency
parameters.description: quote currency, currently only supports USDT, KCS, BTC, USDT as default

totalConversionBalance.description: The total balance of the isolated margin account(in the request coin)

liabilityConversionBalance.description: Total liabilities of the isolated margin account(in the request coin)

status.description: The position status: Existing liabilities-DEBT, No liabilities-CLEAR, Bankrupcy (after position enters a negative balance)-BANKRUPTCY, Existing borrowings-IN_BORROW, Existing repayments-IN_REPAY, Under liquidation-IN_LIQUIDATION, Under auto-renewal assets-IN_AUTO_RENEW .

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to get the info list of the isolated margin account.

get.summary: Get Account Detail - Isolated Margin - V1
get.description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the isolated margin account.

status.description: The position status: Existing liabilities-DEBT, No liabilities-CLEAR, Bankrupcy (after position enters a negative balance)-BANKRUPTCY, Existing borrowings-IN_BORROW, Existing repayments-IN_REPAY, Under liquidation-IN_LIQUIDATION, Under auto-renewal assets-IN_AUTO_RENEW .

get.x-sdk-method-description: Request via this endpoint to get the info of the isolated margin account.
